# RKnowledge - Knowledge Graph Extraction & Analysis

## Overview
RKnowledge is a production-grade CLI tool for extracting concepts and relationships from documents using LLMs. It builds knowledge graphs stored in Neo4j and provides interactive visualization with advanced graph algorithms.

## Key Features
- Extract concepts and relationships from PDFs, Markdown, HTML, and text
- Store and analyze in Neo4j graph database
- Interactive graph visualization
- Graph algorithm analysis
- Batch processing support

## Documentation
https://algiras.github.io/RKnowledge/

## Repository
https://github.com/Algiras/RKnowledge

## Use Cases
- Building knowledge bases from documents
- Knowledge graph visualization
- Semantic relationship discovery
- RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system setup
- Document intelligence systems

## Technologies
- Rust
- Neo4j
- LLM Integration (Claude, OpenAI, etc.)
